strings.Value: "We're running out of food. I'd go hunting myself, but I lack the talent for it…"
"We must replenish our stocks. I'm not sure I can do it, though. I'm not much of a hunter."
"Couldn't you ask Jhod to teach you a thing or two about the Stag God's hunting tricks? You tagged along with him for long enough."
"If you wish to learn, you need only ask. Everyone should know how to hunt."
"I knew we should have taken more rations with us. With hunters like this we'll soon be starving."
"I remember how I used to sing for food on the streets, and in the pubs — back when I was at the Academy. Truth be told, I wasn't very good at it. I do hope it doesn't come to that..."
"Hunting is simple. I teach you! But first we need bait for snare. Linzee will do."
